name: t13_goto_labels
description: Goto-heavy resource cleanup patterns and computed gotos. Exercises goto_statement, labeled_statement structural node indexing, and NONSTANDARD_EXTENSION_PATTERN detection for GCC computed-goto (&&label).
oracle_pressure: Standard goto-based cleanup patterns generate labeled_statement and goto_statement nodes that oracle_ts must index. Computed goto (GCC extension) produces an indirect branch through a label-address table: oracle must detect &&label as NONSTANDARD_EXTENSION_PATTERN. Cross-TU static helpers with identical label names (cleanup, done, fail) test label scoping in DWARF.
